snippet: Many of the accouterments of the White Horse Country Pub and Restaurant pay homage to England, but its offerings extend far beyond shepherd’s pie and Yorkshire pudding.
abstract: Christopher Brooks reviews White Horse Country Pub and Restaurant in Marbledale (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: Many of the accouterments of the White Horse Country Pub and Restaurant pay homage to England, but its offerings extend far beyond shepherd’s pie and Yorkshire pudding.

headline.seo: A Review of the White Horse Country Pub and Restaurant, in Marbledale, Conn.
headline.main: Old World Décor, and a Cosmopolitan Menu
